subject: Integrate Unum Capital API for real fund data and NAV prices
body:
- Add Unum.service.ts with API client (funds, DLS codes, prices)
- Update FundsStore to fetch fund list from Unum API
- Fetch and display real NAV prices with change percentage
- Add FUND_CONFIG mapping for Unumâ†’Fireblocks asset IDs
- Update FundCard to show NAV change indicator
- Add pricing history method for future chart integration
- 5-minute cache to reduce API calls

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Integrate Unum Capital API for real fund data and NAV prices
